LIB_A.name: Book Cipher
LIB_A.instructions: Find the marked book at shelf 'CS-01'. Decode: Page 42 → 5th word, Page 7 → 1st, Page 99 → 3rd, then anagram the four words to get a campus keyword. Show marshal.
LIB_A.proof: Show the four words + final keyword to marshal.

LIB_A.name: Quiet Hunt
LIB_A.instructions: Locate a book whose author's initials match your team name initials. Take a silent 'reading circle' photo (no faces needed) and show to marshal.

LIB_A.name: Index Race
LIB_A.instructions: Use the book index to find the definition of 'algorithm'. Copy exactly the first ten words by hand on the slip. No phones.

DRAW_A.name: One-Min Logo
DRAW_A.instructions: As a team, sketch the ISTE logo in 60 seconds using only triangles. All team members must add at least one triangle.

DRAW_A.name: Robot Charades
DRAW_A.instructions: In absolute silence, act like a malfunctioning robot for 20 seconds while tracing a path on paper that spells a letter. Marshal must guess the letter.

DRAW_A.name: Blindfold Blueprint
DRAW_A.instructions: One member is blindfolded and draws a simple house guided only by teammates' verbal directions (no pointing).

LAB_DS.name: Cable Logic
LAB_DS.instructions: On the table are 5 labeled cables (A–E). Arrange them so that 'binary' order (0=short,1=long) matches a given pattern on the card.

LAB_DS.name: Post-it Cluster
LAB_DS.instructions: Group 7 tech terms into 2 clusters (Data vs. Model) using post-its. Explain your grouping in one sentence.

LAB_DS.name: Decode & Point
LAB_DS.instructions: Given a printed line of 8-bit binary, convert to ASCII letters (use any method) and point to the next block mentioned.

LAB_P1.name: If-Else Relay
LAB_P1.instructions: Marshal reads conditions (IF wearing glasses THEN clap twice; ELSE stomp once; IF wearing watch THEN spin). Team performs the right sequence.

LAB_P1.name: Sort Yourselves
LAB_P1.instructions: Sort the team by birthday month from Jan→Dec without speaking. When done, say the months in order.

LAB_P1.name: Stack & Queue
LAB_P1.instructions: Use cups to demonstrate PUSH, POP (stack) and ENQUEUE, DEQUEUE (queue). Marshal calls operations; perform live.

LAB_P2.name: Regex Hunt
LAB_P2.instructions: On a printed sheet of random characters, circle all vowels that are immediately followed by a digit. Count aloud.

LAB_P2.name: Binary Beat
LAB_P2.instructions: Clap '1', stay silent '0' to perform this 16-bit rhythm. Teammate writes the bits they hear.

LAB_P2.name: Pointer Dance
LAB_P2.instructions: Place arrows on the floor to form a cycle (A→B→C→A). Walk the cycle twice, then break it by removing one arrow to make a list.

CANT_B.name: Human Wi‑Fi
CANT_B.instructions: Pose as a human Wi‑Fi icon (concentric arcs). Take a photo and show marshal (faces optional).

CANT_B.name: Menu Cipher
CANT_B.instructions: Using the menu board, take the first letter of 6 different items to form a word related to tech. Read it aloud.

CANT_B.name: Under‑Table Quest
CANT_B.instructions: Find the sticker under a table with a shape. Recreate the shape using spoons/packets on top of the table.

CANT_C.name: Snack Math
CANT_C.instructions: Pick any 3 snack prices. Add them. Map sum to letters (A1Z26). Say the 3-letter code.

CANT_C.name: Queue Etiquette
CANT_C.instructions: Demonstrate a perfect queue: equal spacing, quiet, forward only when allowed. Hold 10 seconds.

CANT_C.name: Emoji Order
CANT_C.instructions: Given 6 printed emojis, arrange to tell a 'canteen' story. Narrate in one sentence.

HALL_A1.name: Lightning Skit
HALL_A1.instructions: Act out 'Inventing the light bulb' in 20 seconds without words. End with a freeze pose.

HALL_A1.name: Rebus Logic
HALL_A1.instructions: Solve a printed rebus (e.g., 'R E A D I N G' stacked over 'ROOM') → 'Reading Room'. Explain answer.

HALL_A1.name: Math→Word
HALL_A1.instructions: Solve: (7×4) – 9 = ?. Map to letter via A1Z26. Combine with two more mini sums to form a 3-letter word.

HALL_A2.name: Tongue Twister Relay
HALL_A2.instructions: Each member says one word of a tongue twister in order without mistakes. Two retries max.

HALL_A2.name: Paper Tower
HALL_A2.instructions: Build the tallest free‑standing paper tower in 2 minutes using 6 sheets and tape.

HALL_A2.name: Echo Location
HALL_A2.instructions: Marshal whispers a 5-word campus phrase. Team repeats exactly. (No recording.)

HALL_C3.name: Silent Sudoku Mini
HALL_C3.instructions: Fill a 3×3 mini Sudoku from a printed card. No talking allowed.

HALL_C3.name: Tech Pictionary
HALL_C3.instructions: Draw a 'Bluetooth' symbol without writing letters/numbers. Teammates must guess.

HALL_C3.name: Freeze Frame
HALL_C3.instructions: Create a silent tableau of 'Teamwork'. Hold pose for 8 seconds.

NB_A1.name: Find the Tiny
NB_A1.instructions: Locate the micro-sticker '∆' on this board. Draw it 5× bigger on the slip.

NB_A1.name: Word Sweep
NB_A1.instructions: From any 4 notices, grab the first letter of the first line to form a word.

NB_A1.name: Odd One Out
NB_A1.instructions: Given 5 small icons on a card, pin the odd one to the board and explain why.

NB_A2.name: Arrow Trail
NB_A2.instructions: Follow 3 tiny arrows on the board to a small circle. Copy the circle pattern.

NB_A2.name: Rhyme Time
NB_A2.instructions: Make a two-line rhyme using a word from a notice.

NB_A2.name: Count & Tell
NB_A2.instructions: Count total sheets on this board and say it backwards.

NB_A3.name: Color Pick
NB_A3.instructions: Name all distinct paper colors on this board within 10 seconds.

NB_A3.name: Date Scan
NB_A3.instructions: Find the earliest date visible and say the exact day-month-year.

NB_A3.name: Font Spy
NB_A3.instructions: Identify a serif vs sans-serif head on the board. Point to both.

NB_A4.name: Corner Quest
NB_A4.instructions: There is a dot in one corner (tiny). Find and touch it simultaneously as a team.

NB_A4.name: Arrow Math
NB_A4.instructions: There are 3 arrows hidden. Sum their directions: up=+1, down=−1, left=+2, right=−2.

NB_A4.name: Missing Vowel
NB_A4.instructions: Pick a notice title and say it without vowels.

NB_A5.name: Sticker Grid
NB_A5.instructions: Find a 2×2 grid of tiny stickers (•• / ••). Recreate it on paper.

NB_A5.name: Hashtag Hunt
NB_A5.instructions: Find a # symbol anywhere on this board or notices. Point it out.

NB_A5.name: Palindrome
NB_A5.instructions: From any line on a notice, extract a 3-letter palindrome (e.g., 'aba').

NB_A6.name: Right or Left
NB_A6.instructions: Count how many notices have right-aligned text. Say the number.

NB_A6.name: Icon Match
NB_A6.instructions: Find a phone/email icon. Mimic it as a pose.

NB_A6.name: Tear Edge
NB_A6.instructions: Locate a torn edge notice. Estimate the missing area in squares (1 sq = your palm).
